name: MarginNote
title: marginnote.com
shortDescription: MarginNote is an all-in-one learning tool refined over ten years, inspired by the academic journeys of many learners. It integrates features like annotations, highlights, and note visualization to enhance metacognitive learning. Ideal for students and researchers, it helps in organizing knowledge, sparking new ideas, and retaining information effectively.
cons: May have a steep learning curve
Limited to educational and research contexts
